cloudsql
********


Description
===========

Adds Cloud SQL to your cluster. You can use Cloud SQL to query against
non-relational data stored in multiple big data sources, including
Apache Hive, HDFS, Oracle NoSQL Database, and Apache HBase. Adding
Cloud SQL adds a query server node to the cluster and creates cell
servers on all the worker nodes in the cluster. [Command
Reference](addCloudSql)


Available Commands
==================

* add

* remove
